remarks: Invert coefficient of scalar product.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Apr-2015.)
statement:
lvecinv.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lvecinv.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lvecinv.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lvecinv.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lvecinv.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` F ) $.
lvecinv.i $e |- I = ( invr ` F ) $.
lvecinv.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lvecinv.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( K \ { .0. } ) ) $.
lvecinv.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lvecinv.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lvecinv $p |- ( ph -> ( X = ( A .x. Y ) <-> Y = ( ( I ` A ) .x. X ) ) ) $.
